To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private VolumeProfile _vp;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_vp = VP(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_vp.IsReady)
{
    var volumePerPrice = _vp.VolumePerPrice.Value;
    var profileHigh = _vp.ProfileHigh.Value;
    var profileLow = _vp.ProfileLow.Value;
    var pOCPrice = _vp.POCPrice.Value;
    var pOCVolume = _vp.POCVolume.Value;
    var valueAreaVolume = _vp.ValueAreaVolume.Value;
    var valueAreaHigh = _vp.ValueAreaHigh.Value;
    var valueAreaLow = _vp.ValueAreaLow.Value;
    var current = _vp.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.vp = self.VP(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.vp.IsReady:
    volume_per_price = self.vp.VolumePerPrice.Value
    profile_high = self.vp.ProfileHigh.Value
    profile_low = self.vp.ProfileLow.Value
    p_o_c_price = self.vp.POCPrice.Value
    p_o_c_volume = self.vp.POCVolume.Value
    value_area_volume = self.vp.ValueAreaVolume.Value
    value_area_high = self.vp.ValueAreaHigh.Value
    value_area_low = self.vp.ValueAreaLow.Value
    current = self.vp.Current.Value
